posts.title: GitHub integration
posts.text: Not a lot of people know it, but #PyCharm is tightly integrated with GitHub (sneak peek: there is more coming). Check out how easy it is to get started with a repository from GitHub.

posts.text: It's been a while since our last webinar, but we came back strong! On Tuesday, the 28th of July at 18h CEST / 12h EDT we will host "Simplify Your Tests With Fixtures" with Oliver Bestwalter. Make sure to register now!

posts.title: Crazy
posts.text: If you want a fun example of how standards people are often completely disconnected from reality, the DAB digital radio specification includes an entire section on delivering Java applets over digital radio. Not a single product ever implemented it.

posts.title: Government
posts.text: Somehow, this government is managing to exceed all of my expectations of just how hopeless it would be.

posts.title: On Google
posts.text:
It's pretty hard to tell whether many Google technologies would make it out of the starting gate without the heavy thumb that Google monopoly power places on the scale.
Ironically, Googlers all believe that their technologies are winning because they're better..
